m_szDocTitle: New Tesla Model S May Have Us Rethink Electric Cars | OilPrice.com
m_szDocSumamry: New Tesla Model S May Have Us Rethink Electric Cars New Tesla Model S May Have Us Rethink Electric Cars Posted on Wed, 15 October 2014 21:34 | 0 CREDIT: AP Photo (Rinfo H. W. Chiu) Tesla unveiled an all-wheel drive version of its Model-S on Thursday. The new car is an improvement over the two-wheel-drive version in almost every way, with increased efficiency, range, acceleration, top speed, and a slew of futuristic auto-pilot features. Until now, all-wheel-drive (AWD) vehicles were less efficient and slower than rear-wheel drives due to the added mass of a second motor. This is not the case fo
